includedAssets.title: Episode 1
includedAssets.synopsis: DS Steve Arnott is tasked with leading an internal affairs investigation into the city's best cop.

includedAssets.title: Season 1
includedAssets.synopsis: A botched counter-terrorism operation leads to DS Steve Arnott being reassigned to internal affairs, where he is tasked with investigating one of the city's most decorated cops. First series of the BAFTA-nominated crime drama.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: DS Steve Arnott is tasked with investigating one of the city's most decorated cops. First series of the BAFTA-nominated crime drama.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: A botched counter-terrorism operation leads to DS Steve Arnott being reassigned to internal affairs, where he is tasked with investigating one of the city's most decorated cops. First series of the BAFTA-nominated crime drama.

includedIn.title: Line Of Duty
includedIn.shortSynopsis: After being reassigned to internal affairs, DS Steve Arnott attempts to find the truth in a police force crippled by corruption.
includedIn.mediumSynopsis: After being reassigned to internal affairs, DS Steve Arnott attempts to find the truth in a police force crippled by corruption.
